wattwatt.interfaces.devices.suspendable.fridge

Interface IFridge

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, IDevices, ISuspendable, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FridgeConnector, FridgeInPort, FridgeOutPort

    public interface IFridge
extends ISuspendable
    The interface IFridge

    Description

    Defines the interface for our fridge device. A Fridge is a suspendable device that has two compartments. Each compartments have a different temperature on which to stay. This component when it's working will try to always keep those compartments at the right temperature.

    Created on : 2020-01-27

    Author:

    Bah Thierno, Zheng Pascal
